Package zipkin.collector.kafka

Class KafkaCollector

  • java.lang.Object
    • zipkin.collector.kafka.KafkaCollector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, CollectorComponent, Component

    public final class KafkaCollector
extends java.lang.Object
implements CollectorComponent
    This collector polls a Kafka topic for messages that contain TBinaryProtocol big-endian encoded lists of spans. These spans are pushed to a span consumer.

    This collector remains a Kafka 0.8.x consumer, while Zipkin systems update to 0.9+.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  KafkaCollector.Builder
      Configuration including defaults needed to consume spans from a Kafka topic.
